Name: Vodka Daisy
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. CHURN (stir) drink with ice and serve with straws.
Review: Dependent on your raspberry syrup (homemade is best) you'll either have a beautifully fruity and refreshing drink, or one that's a tad on the sweet side. Adjust to taste.
Nutrition: One serving of Vodka Daisy contains 237 calories
